column4: I will wipe the MBR by installing Ubuntu 10.10, I have no other choice, but then I'm gonna have to wipe Ubuntu installing Windows XP, and I hope --I really hope-- the installation will not fail again.

What I did on the infected Windows XP was to scan it with Avast, Avast then sent some key files to the vault --rundll32.exe-- etc, and when I tried to re-install Windows XP again from the CD I get error after error about not being able to accesss the files which I know are those Avast locked, this is sooo weird.
I went to Windows, it's not helping me, look: I am an Ubuntu user, I am talking about a Windows XP which is on a friend's computer.
not getting help in ##windows does not make this the fallback windows support channel however
